original_text:
But to the wicked person, God says:
“What right have you to recite my laws
    or take my covenant on your lips?
korean_text: 악인에게는 하나님이 이르시되 네가 어찌하여 내 율례를 전하며 내 언약을 네 입에 두느냐

sentences.original_text: But to the wicked person, God says:
What right have you to recite my laws
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 무슨 권리로 나의 법을 낭송하며

sentences.original_text: or take my covenant on your lips?
